steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace. 2. Allow the crucible to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours). Avoid rapid cooling to prevent cracking.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace. 2. Allow the crucible to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours). Avoid rapid cooling to prevent cracking.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified material from the crucible. 2. Inspect for any surface irregularities. 3. If necessary, use fine-grade sandpaper to smooth out the surfaces. 4. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance surface durability. 5. Store in a dry environment to prevent oxidation.
